com.revolsys.jts.operation.linemerge

Class LineMergeEdge

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revolsys.jts.planargraph.GraphComponent
      • com.revolsys.jts.planargraph.Edge
        • com.revolsys.jts.operation.linemerge.LineMergeEdge

  • public class LineMergeEdge
extends Edge
    An edge of a LineMergeGraph. The marked field indicates whether this Edge has been logically deleted from the graph.
    Version:
    1.7
